attributes.action: Debate / investigate the alledged child abuse at Celtic Boys Club and Celtic FC
attributes.additional_details: MP’ s to debate the facts and rule whether Celtic fc should be made to pay compensation and face legal and SFA ruling body punishments
attributes.background:
Alledge child abuse has been uncovered at Celtic Football club 
The times newspaper has printed a story connecting the football club to the scandal but they claim to be a separate entity 

In light of recent FA cases and cases in the US Celtic have tried to distance themselves deliberately

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Child protection, including inquiries into historic child abuse is devolved to the Scottish Government and Scottish Parliament.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
